## ColorHSV.toObject() method

Returns the [ColorHSV](./fast-colors.colorhsv.md) formatted as an object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toObject(): {
        h: number;
        s: number;
        v: number;
    };
```
<b>Returns:</b>

{ h: number; s: number; v: number; }
